channel.title: Compile problem
channel.description:
I do everything right, and i know forsure becuase i did it before. But, before, my friend edited my compile. He put some type of code in it. But, for somereason, since i redownloaded it, the code isnt in there. So, i need to out the code back in there. Whats the code.
When i compile it says "'javac' is not reconized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue..."

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @KillerbeeWon KillerbeeWon
item.description:
@KillerbeeWon wrote:

Ok, erased it. But, tried to change it again, and gave long message, and didnt change. :|[br][size=1]Posted on: February 08, 2007, 12:04:48 AM[/size][hr]Please help. I redownloaded jdk and nothin happened. My friend told me there might be a newer verision i need to download, but i got 1.6.0. Any help?

Read full topic

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

I put …\ in there because I’m too lazy to write out the entire thing, and I have too much in the clipboard to Ctrl+C it.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @KillerbeeWon KillerbeeWon
item.description:
@KillerbeeWon wrote:

I just tried to change my server name and still didnt change, from source name.

Now reads:::

@echo off title Ultimate PK Compiler ...\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

I know, I just said that.

...\javac.exe" *.java

Read full topic

item.description:
@KillerbeeWon wrote:

Maybe if you see the problem you could help. Below…

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

*.java ? Basically compile each file ending in “.java” would be my guess.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @KillerbeeWon KillerbeeWon
item.description:
@KillerbeeWon wrote:

Now, i think there is one last problem. It now says

@echo off title Ultimate PK Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" pause

But, there was something above the thing you told be to put in. But, i accedently removed it. Do you know? When i do compile now, it hole list of stuff comes up. But, i think if i had the one little thing, it would be good.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Ah, yeh, the interpreter is very picky about spaces.

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe"

Read full topic

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @KillerbeeWon KillerbeeWon
item.description:
@KillerbeeWon wrote:

I know exactly what you mean. Thanks![br][size=1]Posted on: February 07, 2007, 11:21:25 PM[/size][hr]Now i edit it. It says

@echo off title Ultimate PK Compiler -something else, just cant remember pause

Then i put

@echo off title Ultimate PK Compiler C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe pause

But then the complier then says

“‘C:\Program’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue…”

Read full topic

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

You need to have it the path to the compiler majig thigy

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe

Read full topic
